Interface RelationDictionary

public interface RelationDictionary

An interface for the access of Relations.

Method Detail

getRelationsFor

java.util.List<RelationObject> getRelationsFor(java.lang.String lemma)
Retrieves all Relations for lemma. They are wrapped in a RelationObject since lemma possibly has more than one sense. A RelationObject is created for each sense of the lemma with the associated relations.

Parameters:
lemma - the lemma for which to retrieve relations, may not be null or emtpy.
Returns:
a List of RelationObjects containing LexicalRelations for lemma, or an empty List if nothing is found.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param null or empty.

getRelationsFor

java.util.List<? extends Relation> getRelationsFor(Item item)
Retrieves all Relations for item.

Parameters:
item - the item for which to retrieve relations, may not be null or emtpy.
Returns:
a sorted List of RelationObjects containing LexicalRelations for lemma, or an empty List if nothing is found.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param null or empty.

getRelationsFor

java.util.List<RelationObject> getRelationsFor(java.lang.String lemma1,
                                               java.lang.String lemma2)
Retrieves the Relation connecting lemma1 and lemma2. In some cases different senses of the two lemmata might be related, hence the return of a List of relations, even if it will in most cases only contain one element (or none if no relation is found).

Parameters:
lemma1 - a lemma to search relation for in combination with lemma2, may not be null or empty.
lemma2 - a lemma to search relation for in combination with lemma1, may not be null or empty.
Returns:
a List of RelationObjects connecting lemma1 and lemma2, or an empty List if nothing is found.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if params are null or empty

getRelationsFor

java.util.List<Relation> getRelationsFor(Item item1,
                                         Item item2)
Retrieves the Relation connecting item1 and item2.

Parameters:
item1 - an item to search relation for in combination with item2, may not be null
item2 - an item to search relation for in combination with item1, may not be null
Returns:
a sorted List of LexicalRelations connecting item1 and item2, or an empty List if nothing is found.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if params are null

getRelationsHavingLeft

java.util.List<RelationObject> getRelationsHavingLeft(java.lang.String lemma,
                                                      RelationType type)
Retrieves all Relations having lemma as the left item and type as RelationType.

Parameters:
lemma - the left lemma of the Relations to retrieve
type - the RelationType of the Relations to retrieve
Returns:
a List of RelationObjects matching the parameter criteria
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if params are null or empty

getRelationsHavingLeft

                                                RelationType type)
Retrieves all Relations having item as the left item and type as RelationType.

Parameters:
item - the left item of the Relations to retrieve
type - the RelationType of the Relations to retrieve
Returns:
a sorted List of Relations matching the parameter criteria
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if params are null
